data.eml:eml: Two new species of the South Asian catfish genus Pseudolaguvia from northeastern India (Teleostei: Sisoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tamang, Lakpa, Sinha, Bikramjit (2014): Two new species of the South Asian catfish genus Pseudolaguvia from northeastern India (Teleostei: Sisoridae). Zootaxa 3887 (1): 37-54, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3887.1.2
